archimate:Requirement.name: IM.2.1.7c: c) monitoring each record to ensure it complies with the organisation's document retention policy and schedule (e.g. providing a notification when the retention period has ended)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
